p: Other clinicians in China also studied chest CT scans and confirmed typical multilobar involvement on presentation, but summarized “when one or two lobes are involved, the effect on lung function is not serious, and the symptoms of shortness of breath and dyspnea are not severe” [ 15]. If the disease progresses, however, the patient will develop a “white lung” with diffuse alveolar damage involving multiple lobes [ 15].
